name: Poomkin
description:
Left = a

Right = d

Down = s

Up = w

Shoot = Left mouse button

Dash = Shift

Warning I'm very sorry but unfortunately due to time constraints I can't manage to optimize

 this game so in the second level you will have lower FPS again so I apologize and I hope that you will still enjoy my game.

 Btw  please play it in FullScreen
